DarkMouse::

She heard them and brought up the lock down commands in the computer 
and shut down all exits and entrances, closed all the hatched and 
locked the base down.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest calmly watches the battle against Quickstrike. He shakes 
his 
> head when the small bot was put into stasis. Such pathetic troops.
> 
> "I suggest that he is killed," he says to DrillBit, his scanners 
> keeping track of all the bot signatures.
> 
> "Allright, so the plan is to open fire with the defences and then 
> destroy the rest of them?" he asks, frowning. "Are the walls of 
this 
> base thick enough to take a big explosion, and is there a lockdown 
> function? They'll try to get away, we need to trap and kill them."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> > 
> > He stumbled back holding his leg, where he was bit.
> > Then he was injected by Sphink.
> > "Thank you."
> > He turned to Dark Mouse.
> > "Follow his orders, bring on thos defences. With the fighting and
> > gunfire just now, everythings going to hit the fan real soon."
